typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AttendancePattern as integer,
		Cost as double,
		CostDescription as string,
		CourseId as integer,
		CourseName as string,
		CourseURL as string,
		DeliveryMode as integer,
		DurationUnit as integer,
		DurationValue as integer,
		FlexibleStartDate as boolean,
		LearnAimRef as string,
		National as boolean,
		ProviderUKPRN as integer,
		Regions as string[],
		StartDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		VenueId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT c.ProviderUKPRN\n,c.CourseId\n,c.LearnAimRef\n,cx.CourseName\n,cx.DeliveryMode\n,cx.FlexibleStartDate\n,cx.StartDate\n,cx.CourseURL\n,cx.Cost\n,cx.CostDescription\n,cx.National\n,cx.Regions\n,cx.VenueId\n,cx.UpdatedDate\n,cx.DurationUnit\n,cx.DurationValue\n,cx.AttendancePattern\nFROM   c\nJOIN   cx IN c.CourseRuns\nWHERE c.CourseStatus = 1 \nAND c.IsValid = true',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
